item.description:
Note: This event requires a reservation and it may or may not require a deposit by the organizer so all cancellations within 48 hours of the event requires a reason. Please do not sign up unless you are sure that you can make it.

----------------------------------------------------------------------

The membership has voted! The March Restaurant of the month is the Surf Restaurant.

About the Restaurant of the Month:
Since opening in 2002, Surf has set the standard in New Hampshire for fresh, exquisitely prepared seafood. Guided by Chef and owner Michael Buckley, Surf has built a reputation for truly imaginative cooking using only the very freshest fish and shellfish.

This commitment to freshness can be tasted in everything we prepare. Voted Best Seafood in New Hampshire, Surf offers a wonderful combination of great service, plus wine and culinary expertise in a relaxed and inviting atmosphere. The result is a dining experience thatâ€™s perfect for special occasions and everyday enjoyment.


Menu:

item.name: FAN Restaurant of the Month
